short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts video URLs as well as download videos from LinkedIn Learning course for free

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you extract and download the videos from LinkedIn Learning portal.
- Go to LinkedIn Learning video
- Open any video that you would like to download
- enable the toggle to download videos

Created by - Aniket Desai
Follow on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/desai-aniket/
